annonstext:
Our business is growing fast and we have a lot of exciting challenges ahead of us to scale up and build out our financial platform to support this growth. 

We are looking for skilled and driven backend developers who wants to be part of designing and building out the financial core systems that enables our business. This includes, among other things, the handling of loans, payments, bank transfers, and APIs for both user facing functionality and back-office administration.

We believe that you have experience of working with SQL and building services in some programming language. Your ability to pick up new skills as you go is also excellent. 

Given the nature of the job, attention to detail and a drive to create solid, reliable solutions are key. Great if you have worked with accounting or financial systems but it’s not a must.

We value having a tech stack that’s both competitive and exciting to work with, that naturally evolves as we go. Our current stack includes TypeScript/Javascript, Python, Go, PostgreSQL, Kubernetes, and Airflow.

If you’re excited about joining this journey and make an impact by building a financial service that really helps its customers, get in touch so we can make this happen together!
annonstextFormaterad:
Our business is growing fast and we have a lot of exciting challenges ahead of us to scale up and build out our financial platform to support this growth.

We are looking for skilled and driven backend developers who wants to be part of designing and building out the financial core systems that enables our business. This includes, among other things, the handling of loans, payments, bank transfers, and APIs for both user facing functionality and back-office administration.


We believe that you have experience of working with SQL and building services in some programming language. Your ability to pick up new skills as you go is also excellent.


Given the nature of the job, attention to detail and a drive to create solid, reliable solutions are key. Great if you have worked with accounting or financial systems but it’s not a must.


We value having a tech stack that’s both competitive and exciting to work with, that naturally evolves as we go. Our current stack includes TypeScript/Javascript, Python, Go, PostgreSQL, Kubernetes, and Airflow.


If you’re excited about joining this journey and make an impact by building a financial service that really helps its customers, get in touch so we can make this happen together!
